summary: An example script that sets up and runs AlignProp training for a Stable Diffusion model, configuring hyperparameters such as epochs, batch size, gradient accumulation, and sample steps, while handling multi‑GPU execution and logging progress with Weights & Biases.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly fine‑tune image generation models using preference‑based reinforcement learning, accelerating product development and research on aligned AI-generated content.
